name: Disable Admin Bar for Non-Admins
author: Sirius Pro

sections.description:
Simply Disable Admin Bar for Non-Admins users like subscribers, authors, editors or contributors. Show your page or shop for users without visible admin bar for other. This plugin works with most of the available themes. Just install and activate this plugin to remove and hide WordPress admin bar for al users except administrators.

Read more about this plugin on WordPress blog.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the disable-admin-bar-fro-non-admins.zip folder.
  2. Upload the disable-admin-bar-fro-non-admins folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. In your WordPress dashboard, head over to the Plugins section.
  4. Activate Disable Admin Bar for Non-Admins.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Fix for not removing admin bar.

1.1

  • New plugin icons and some fixes

1.0

  • First public release od plugin
